title: kannulara kaNthinipuDu
sahitya:
kannulAra kaNtinipuDu kAnci varaduni nE

anupallavi

 punnima canduruni gEru pUrNa vadanuDaina harini

caraNam 1

 rAmakrSNa hari hariyani nAma kIrtanala sEyucu 
nEmamutO nidura jenda svAmi ni nE svapnamu nanu
 
caraNam 2

 garuDa gamuDakucu veDali gangoNTrA maNTapamuna 
sthiramugAnu nelakonu avasaramunanaty-adbhutamuga
 
caraNam 3

 parama bhAgavatulellanu karamula tambUra meraya 
caraNamula gajjalanu gaTTi hari hariyani pogaDucurAgA
 
caraNam 4

 vEnkaTAdri modalupudhulu vinuti sEyucu naTanamulADa 
sankaTamulu tIre nanucu sAkSAtkArambuna nE
 
caraNam 5

 hari hariyani moraliDagA parama padamu nuNDi veDali 
saraguna yAmakari drunci karini gAcinaTTi vArini
 
caraNam 6

 pArthuni sati krSNAyana yArttini tolaginci brOci 
kIrti jendinaTTi krSNamUrtina praNathArtti haruni
 
caraNam 7

 gurutara drDha bhaktiyandu gUDhavarttiyai velayucu 
parama shAntuDainayaTTi guru kaTAkSambuna nE
 
caraNam 8

 rAmacandrapurini veDali rAmadAsu nElu koraku 
nEmamutO hasti girini nelakonu shrI varaduni nE
